name: Queen Anne's Revenge
description: Blackbeard's Ship. Discovered off of the coast of North Carolina in 1997

name: Flying Dutchman
description: A legendary ghost ship that can never make port and is doomed to sail the oceans forever. Its captain is Davy Jones.

name: Black Pearl
description: The Black Pearl was an infamous pirate ship, originally named the Wicked Wench. Captained by Jack Sparrow and Hector Barbossa

name: The Hispaniola
description: Pirate ship from the Novel Treasure Island.
